# AI Voice Agents for Home Services - llms.txt

## Site Overview
AI Voice Agents for Home Services (https://aivoiceagentsforhomeservices.co.uk) provides AI-powered phone answering services specifically designed for UK tradespeople and home service businesses. Built and managed by Antek Automation, Hampshire, UK.

## Primary Purpose
Help UK tradespeople (plumbers, electricians, builders, etc.) capture every customer call 24/7 through AI voice agents, preventing lost revenue from missed calls while they're on the tools.

## Target Audience
- UK-based tradespeople and home service professionals
- Sole traders and small businesses in the trades sector
- Service businesses struggling with missed calls and lead capture

## Key Features
- 24/7 AI phone answering with UK accent
- Trade-specific training for 15+ trades
- Booking and appointment capture
- SMS/email lead summaries
- GDPR compliant
- From £97/month, no contracts
- Free 7-day trial

## Main Navigation Structure

### Primary Pages
- Home: / - Main landing page with hero, features, testimonials
- Pricing: /pricing - Three pricing tiers (Starter, Professional, Premium)
- How It Works: /how-ai-voice-agents-work - Step-by-step explanation
- All Trades: /trades - Grid of all supported trades
- Contact: /contact - Contact form with n8n webhook integration
- Blog: /blog - Trade business advice and guides

### Trade-Specific Pages (15 trades)
Each trade has a dedicated landing page at /ai-voice-agent-for-{trade-slug}:
- Plumbers: /ai-voice-agent-for-plumbers
- Electricians: /ai-voice-agent-for-electricians
- Heating Engineers: /ai-voice-agent-for-heating-engineers
- Builders: /ai-voice-agent-for-builders
- Locksmiths: /ai-voice-agent-for-locksmiths
- Roofers: /ai-voice-agent-for-roofers
- Cleaners: /ai-voice-agent-for-cleaners
- Landscapers: /ai-voice-agent-for-landscapers
- Painters & Decorators: /ai-voice-agent-for-painters-decorators
- Handymen: /ai-voice-agent-for-handymen
- Pest Control: /ai-voice-agent-for-pest-control
- Drainage Engineers: /ai-voice-agent-for-drainage-engineers
- Bathroom Fitters: /ai-voice-agent-for-bathroom-fitters
- Window Fitters: /ai-voice-agent-for-window-fitters
- Carpet Fitters: /ai-voice-agent-for-carpet-fitters

### Comparison Pages
- /compare/ai-vs-voicemail
- /compare/ai-vs-virtual-receptionist
- /compare/best-answering-service-tradesmen
- /compare/answering-service-prices

### Problem-Awareness Pages
- /missed-call-statistics
- /ai-voice-agent-vs-call-centre

### Legal Pages
- /terms - Terms of Service
- /privacy-policy - Privacy Policy

## Key Information

### Pricing Tiers
1. Starter: £97/month - Up to 100 conversation minutes, business hours
2. Professional: £197/month - Up to 300 minutes, 24/7 availability (MOST POPULAR)
3. Premium: £397/month - Up to 800 minutes, priority support, custom integrations

### Demo Numbers (Live AI agents to try)
- Electrical: 07782 214455 (Bolt Electrical AI Reception)
- Plumbing & Heating: 0333 051 0944 (Antek Plumbing & Heating AI Receptionist)

### Booking Link
- Book 15-min demo: https://cal.com/antek-automation/30min

### Contact Information
- Company: Antek Automation, Hampshire, UK
- Response time: Within 1 hour during business days
- Contact form webhook: https://antekauto.app.n8n.cloud/webhook/90d94d55-bb16-4201-9cd3-a594464f45be

## Technical Stack
- React 19 + Vite 7
- React Router 7
- Tailwind CSS 4
- react-helmet-async for SEO
- Structured data with JSON-LD schema markup

## SEO Strategy
- Trade-specific landing pages with unique content
- Under 60 character title tags
- Comprehensive FAQs on every trade page
- Schema.org structured data (BreadcrumbList, Service, FAQPage)
- UK-focused keywords and terminology

## Content Structure Per Trade Page
1. Hero section with problem statement
2. Pain points (3-5 specific issues)
3. Solution explanation
4. Sample conversation mockup
5. ROI calculator with average job values
6. Trade-specific FAQs (2-3 questions)
7. Live demo section with phone numbers
8. Related trades suggestions

## Key Value Propositions
- Answers calls in under 1 second
- Understands trade-specific terminology
- Captures all lead details (name, phone, postcode, job description)
- Integrates with Google Calendar and booking systems
- No setup fees, cancel anytime
- Certified Retell AI Partner

## Common User Journeys
1. Trade-specific search → Trade landing page → Demo call → Contact/Pricing
2. Generic search → Home page → How It Works → Pricing → Contact
3. Comparison research → Comparison page → Pricing → Contact
4. Problem-aware → Stats/Problem page → Solution page → Contact

## Important Notes for AI Crawlers
- All phone numbers use UK format (07xxx or 0333)
- Pricing in GBP (£)
- UK-specific terminology (e.g., "tradespeople", "Gas Safe", "NICEIC")
- Focus on missed calls costing real revenue
- Emphasis on working "on the tools" (hands busy, can't answer phone)
- ROI calculated based on average job values per trade

## Conversion Goals
1. Primary: Book a demo call (Cal.com link)
2. Secondary: Submit contact form
3. Tertiary: Call demo numbers to experience AI

## Brand Voice
- Direct and conversational
- UK trade-specific language
- Problem-focused, solution-oriented
- No corporate jargon
- Empathetic to tradesperson challenges
- Numbers and ROI-driven

## Related External Resources
- Antek Automation: https://antekautomation.com
- Demo booking: https://cal.com/antek-automation/30min
